## matches() function

Check if a key matches any of the given bindings. Only enabled bindings are considered.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function matches(key: Matchable, ...bindings: Binding[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

bindings


</td><td>

[Binding](./key.binding.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

## Example


```ts
import { KeyMsg } from "@suds-cli/tea";
import { matches, newBinding } from "@suds-cli/key";

const keymap = {
  up: newBinding({ keys: ["k", "up"], help: { key: "↑/k", desc: "up" } }),
  down: newBinding({ keys: ["j", "down"], help: { key: "↓/j", desc: "down" } }),
};

function update(msg: Msg) {
  if (msg._tag === "key") {
    if (matches(msg, keymap.up)) {
      // handle up
    } else if (matches(msg, keymap.down)) {
      // handle down
    }
  }
}
```
